resources.string: What would you like to analyze?
Analyze this food image and provide a calorie estimate for the entire meal. Break down the approximate calorie content for each visible item if possible.
Analyze this food image and provide a detailed nutritional breakdown including approximate macronutrients (protein, carbs, fats) and key micronutrients.
Analyze this food image and categorize it by cuisine type, meal type (breakfast/lunch/dinner/snack), and whether it\'s vegetarian, vegan, pescatarian, or contains meat.
Analyze this food image and suggest 3 similar meals that would provide alternative nutritional profiles (healthier options, different protein sources, etc).
Ushbu ovqat rasmini tahlil qiling va butun taom uchun kaloriya miqdorini aniqlang. Iloji bo\'lsa, har bir ko\'rinadigan mahsulot uchun taxminiy kaloriya miqdorini ko\'rsating.
Ushbu ovqat rasmini tahlil qiling va taxminiy makronutrientlar (oqsil, uglevodlar, yogʻlar) va asosiy mikronutrientlarni qoʻshgan holda batafsil ozuqaviy tarkibni taqdim eting.

Ushbu ovqat rasmini tahlil qiling va uni oshxona turi, taom turi (nonushta/tushlik/kechki ovqat/gazak) bo\'yicha toifalang va u vegetarian, vegan, pescatarian yoki go\'sht tarkibida mavjudligini aniqlang.
Ushbu ovqat rasmini tahlil qiling va muqobil ozuqaviy profillarni (sog\'lomroq variantlar, turli xil oqsil manbalari va boshqalar) taqdim etadigan 3 ta o\'xshash taomni taklif qiling.
